Test2::Require::AuthorTesting(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation Test2::Require::AuthorTesting(3)

NAME

Test2::Require::AuthorTesting - Only run a test when the AUTHOR_TESTING environment variable is set.

DESCRIPTION

It is common practice to write tests that are only run when the AUTHOR_TESTING environment variable is set. This module automates the (admittedly trivial) work of creating such a test.

SYNOPSIS

    use Test2::Require::AuthorTesting;

    ...

    done_testing;

SOURCE

The source code repository for Test2-Suite can be found at https://github.com/Test-More/Test2-Suite/.
